definition: abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province

sentences.english: Yang Jinwei see Quebec accounted for lynching, grim-faced trying to explain.
sentences.chinese: 楊晉緯見張佔魁公報私仇，氣得面色鐵青極力解釋。
那張鐵青的長臉上神色緩和了。

sentences.english: Death grew pale within the grave.
sentences.chinese: 墳塋中的死鬼，臉色鐵青。

sentences.english: Ranieri is also a gas ashen face.
sentences.chinese: 拉涅利也是氣的面色鐵青。

sentences.english: Never have later " hill mountain is livid face".
sentences.chinese: 永遠不會有後來的“山那邊的山鐵青着臉”。

sentences.english: In addition to the green color of the murals, Shen An iron are blue.
sentences.chinese: 壁畫顏色除石綠以外，都是深暗鐵青色。

sentences.english: Guo father learned this mad complexion.
sentences.chinese: 郭父得知此事氣得面色鐵青。

sentences.english: Dark-red in the face with anger, he jumped up.
sentences.chinese: 他氣得臉色鐵青，暴跳了起來。
“所有人的臉都變得鐵青”，他這樣告訴我。

sentences.english: She stared back at him with livid disbelief.
sentences.chinese: 她鐵青着臉，用難以置信的神情看着他。

sentences.english: When I met him, he became black in the face.
sentences.chinese: 當我見到他時，他氣得臉色鐵青。

definition: to turn red (in the face)/to flush (with embarrassment or anger)
to glower (at sb)/to cast an angry look
lit. dumb as a wooden chicken (idiom); fig. dumbstruck
overwhelmed with shock, horror or amazement/dumbstruck/aghast
to be shocked/to be appalled/to be terrified
lit. crow and peacock make no sound/absolute silence (idiom); not a single voice can be heard/absolute silence
